headline: Invitation Homes Announces Tax Treatment of 2025 Dividends
summary: DALLAS, January 22, 2026--Invitation Homes Inc. (NYSE: INVH) ("Invitation Homes" or the "Company") today announced the tax treatment of its 2025 dividends for its Common Stock as summarized in the table below. The Company’s tax return for 2025 has not yet been filed. As a result, the information in the table below has been calculated using the best available information as of the date of this release.
